mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, HONUM, HOCLASS, HOTITLE, HOCONTENT, HODATE from (select * from HOSTBOARD where HOCLASS = 1 order by HONUM desc)) where rnum > #{startIndex} and rnum <= (#{startIndex}+10)

select * from (select rownum rnum, HONUM, HOCLASS, HOTITLE, HOCONTENT, HODATE from (select * from HOSTBOARD where HOCLASS = 2 order by HONUM desc)) where rnum > #{startIndex} and rnum <= (#{startIndex}+10)
select count(*) from HOSTBOARD where HOCLASS=1
select count(*) from HOSTBOARD where HOCLASS=2
mapper.insert: insert into HOSTBOARD (HONUM, HOCLASS, HOTITLE, HOCONTENT, HODATE) values (HOST_SEQ.nextval, #{hoclass}, #{hotitle}, #{hocontent}, sysdate)
